Interface TransferTypeServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
Service, TransferTypeService
All Known Implementing Classes:
TransferTypeServiceImpl
public interface TransferTypeServiceLocal
extends TransferTypeService

Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

Method Summary

          returns the allowed transfer types for the given user
 java.util.List<TransferType> getConversionTTs()

Method Detail

getAllowedTTs

java.util.Collection<TransferType> getAllowedTTs(Element element)
returns the allowed transfer types for the given user

getConversionTTs

java.util.List<TransferType> getConversionTTs()
gets a list with all possible conversion TT's available for any member account and any currency. A TT is considered a conversion if it goes from member to an unlimited system account.

getConversionTTs

java.util.List<TransferType> getConversionTTs(AccountType fromAccountType)
gets a list with all possible converstion TT's for the specified accountType

getConversionTTs

java.util.List<TransferType> getConversionTTs(Currency currency)
gets a list with all possible conversion TT's available for any member account of the specified currency. A TT is considered a conversion if it goes from member to an unlimited system account.
